LanguageData.RkM_Vexillum.label: Ratkin Vexillum
LanguageData.RkM_Vexillum.description: A carefully crafted ratkin banner that flies clearly on the battlefield, guiding companions and greatly boosting morale.
LanguageData.RkM_CeremonialPolearm.label: Ratkin Ceremonial Polearm
LanguageData.RkM_CeremonialPolearm.description: A luxurious polearm made with fine materials. Beneath its gorgeous appearance lies an extremely dangerous weapon.
LanguageData.RkM_ForgeHammer.label: Ratkin Forge Hammer
LanguageData.RkM_ForgeHammer.description: A useful blacksmith hammer that can improve forging efficiency.
LanguageData.RkM_Lucerne.label: Ratkin Lucerne
LanguageData.RkM_Lucerne.description: A terrifying weapon with a heavy hammer head and armor-piercing spike. Its powerful strikes can dent even the strongest plate armor.
LanguageData.RkM_Halberd.label: Ratkin Halberd
LanguageData.RkM_Halberd.description: A classic polearm that cleverly combines the thrusting of a spear tip, the chopping of an axe blade, and the hooking of a rear spike.
LanguageData.RkM_Spear.label: Ratkin Spear
LanguageData.RkM_Spear.description: A simple but extremely effective polearm. Its long shaft can pierce enemies before they can reach you.
LanguageData.RkM_Rapier.label: Ratkin Rapier
LanguageData.RkM_Rapier.description: A one-handed weapon with a slender blade and complex guard. Its elegant form is both a weapon and a status symbol.
LanguageData.RkM_SteamHammer.label: Ratkin Steam Hammer
LanguageData.RkM_SteamHammer.description: A massive steam-powered hammer created by the ratkin. Each strike is accompanied by the hiss of steam and the tremor of the ground.
LanguageData.RkM_Zweihander.label: Ratkin Zweihander
LanguageData.RkM_Zweihander.description: A carefully crafted two-handed longsword with a flame-like twisted blade designed to cause more terrible tearing wounds.
LanguageData.Item_lavender_a.label: lavender a
LanguageData.RkM_RatWheatFlour.label: rat wheat flour
LanguageData.RkM_RatWheatFlour.description: 由鼠麦粒经石磨精心研磨而成的浅色粉末，质地细腻，带有浓郁的麦香和独特的坚果余韵。是鼠族厨房中最基础且不可或缺的原料，承载着殖民地食物供给的重任。
